Class SimplePolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimplePolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Polygon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConvexPolygon

    public class SimplePolygon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Polygon
    The class SimplePolygon implements the Polygon interface. It is intended to be further extended by ConvexPolygon.
    Author:
    Andy Mirzaian

    • Method Detail

      • getNewPoly

        public static SimplePolygon getNewPoly()
        static factory method constructs and returns an unverified simple-polygon, initialised according to user provided input data. Runs in O(n) time.
        Returns:
        an unverified simple-polygon instance

        Specified by:
        getSize in interface Polygon
        Returns:
        n, the number of edges (equivalently, vertices) of the polygon.

        c - three input points.

      • disjointSegments

        public static boolean disjointSegments(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double a,
                                       java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double b,
                                       java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double c,
                                       java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double d)
        Parameters:
        a -
        b - end points of line-segment (a,b).
        c -
        d - end points of line-segment (c,d).
        Returns:
        true if closed line-segments (a,b) and (c,d) are disjoint. Runs in O(1) time.

      • disjointEdges

        public boolean disjointEdges(int i,
                             int j)
                      throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Parameters:
        i -
        j - indices of two edges of the polygon.
        Returns:
        true if the i-th and j-th edges of the polygon are disjoint. Runs in O(1) time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i or j are outside the index range [0..n-1].

      • isSimple

        public boolean isSimple()
        This method verifies whether the claimed "simple-polygon" is indeed simple.
        Returns:
        true if the polygon is simple. Runs in O(n^2) time.

      • perimeter

        public double perimeter()
        Specified by:
        perimeter in interface Polygon
        Returns:
        the sum of the edge lengths of the polygon. Runs in O(n) time.

      • area

        public double area()
            throws NonSimplePolygonException
        Specified by:
        area in interface Polygon
        Returns:
        area of the polygon interior. Runs in O(n) time not counting the simplicity test.
        Throws:
        NonSimplePolygonException - if the polygon is non-simple.
